attributes.action: keep "Christmas" to be known ONLY as Christmas and to give equal standing to other faiths main religious festivals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir,

The United Kingdom of Great Britain & Northern Ireland is by a large majority a Christian nation so please do not allow Town Councils,Local Government or indeed national governemnt to denounce the main Christian festival of Christmas.

However we the undersigned do put foward that other religions should be given a simalar status to reflect our multi-cultural society. Below are some dates that could be incorporated into the British Bank Holiday schedule:


Suggested Religious Holidays for Uk

Christmas Day & Boxing Day (2 days)- Christian
Eid ul-Fitr and Eid ul-Adha (2 days) -Muslim
Hindu Diwali (1 day) Hindu
Hanukkah (1 day) Jewish
Easter & Good Friday (2 days) Christian
Vesak Day (1 day) Buddhist
Chinese New Year (1 day)
